instructions: Open your device's Settings app. Go to General > Software Update . Tap Download and Install . If you see Resume Download , tap that instead. Your iPad or iPhone will now begin the upgrade to iOS 12, a process that could take hours depending on a number of factors, like the health of your internet connection, the network speed, the speed of your device, and what your device needs to do before the upgrade to make proper room. You might need to complete some initial setup steps before you can use your iPhone or iPad after the iOS 12 update. This is to account for new features and settings.
